name: The Dark Arcanum-Artifacts of Bygone Age
name_original: The Dark Arcanum-Artifacts of Bygone Age
description:
The Dark Arcanum Artifacts of Bygone Age is a First/Third Person Stealth game.In this game,you play as protagonist who explores a mystery place to find a Secret Book and finds himself in a situation surrounded with mystery Societies.You have to survive and find the secrets and the artifacts.

  The game is developed in Unreal Engine 4 and is consistently in development.You can buy the game if you are willing to play it in the current stage(early access) it is in.Right now ,it has a level where you have to explore and find the ancient coins surviving from the zombies.If you purchase now,you will have access to the full version of the game when completed(updated).To know more about the game,check the game's Youtube channel for updates-"TheDarkArcanum-AOBGA".
